data.title: Jim Carrey’s ex-girlfriend Cathriona White was married at the time of
data.meta_description: JIM CARREY'S ex-girlfriend Cathriona White was married to another man at the time of her tragic death, according to reports.
data.text:
The 30-year-old make-up artist was found dead at her Los Angeles home on September 28, following a suspected suicide.

A week after her death Los Angeles County Medical Examiner’s office has confirmed her body will be released to her husband.

An official told The Hollywood Reporter: "She had a husband, we have a husband as next of kin. We're not releasing any more information on next of kin, but we do have her as married."

Cathriona was dating Jim until five days before her death, and a friend of the action confirmed she was in fact separated from her husband and said that she was planning to file for divorce in December.

The source said: "There is no way that Jim would have taken her out to public places if he thought she was married.

"As far as Jim was concerned, Cat was separated from her husband and was going to start divorce proceedings in December.

"When people are separated they date or do whatever they need to do."

The LA County Coroner's office also revealed Cathriona left several suicide notes and four different kinds of medication, including Ambien, Percocet, Zofran and Propranolol, were found at the scene.

This week it was reported Jim is set to fly to Cathriona's native Ireland to attend her funeral.

Following her death, the Bruce Almighty star paid tribute to his former beau, stating: "I am shocked and deeply saddened by the passing of my sweet Cathriona.

"She was a truly kind and delicate Irish flower, too sensitive for this soil, to whom loving and being loved was all that sparkled.

"My heart goes out to her family and friends and to everyone who loved and cared about her. We have all been hit with a lightning bolt."
